sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnfaqinfo ( FAQ_ID /* */ , QESTN_SJ /* */ , QESTN_CN /* */ , ANSWER_CN /* */ , RDCNT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ , QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE /* */ ) VALUES ( #faqId# /* */ , #qestnSj# /* */ , #qestnCn# /* */ , #answerCn# /* */ , #rdcnt# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #atchFileId# /* */ , #qnaProcessSttusCode# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnfaqinfo SET FAQ_ID=#faqId# /* */ , QESTN_SJ=#qestnSj# /* */ , QESTN_CN=#qestnCn# /* */ , ANSWER_CN=#answerCn# /* */ , RDCNT=#rdcnt# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID=#atchFileId# /* */ , QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE=#qnaProcessSttusCode# /* */ WHERE FAQ_ID=#faqId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT FAQ_ID /* */ , QESTN_SJ /* */ , QESTN_CN /* */ , ANSWER_CN /* */ , RDCNT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ , QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE /* */ FROM comtnfaqinfo WHERE FAQ_ID=#faqId# /* */

SELECT FAQ_ID /* */ , QESTN_SJ /* */ , QESTN_CN /* */ , ANSWER_CN /* */ , RDCNT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ , QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE /* */ FROM comtnfaqinfo WHERE 1=1
FAQ_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
QESTN_SJ LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY FAQ_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnfaqinfo WHERE 1=1
FAQ_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
QESTN_SJ LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
